statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_code = 101;
SELECT error_code, error_description, logged_at FROM vehicle_errors WHERE logged_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_description ILIKE '%engine%';
SELECT error_description, diagnostic_info FROM vehicle_errors ORDER BY logged_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_code = 100;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE logged_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT error_code, error_description, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM logged_at) AS hour_logged FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_code IN (200,201,202) ORDER BY error_code DESC;
SELECT error_code, error_description, jsonb_pretty(diagnostic_info) AS diagnostic_info_formatted FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_description ILIKE '%brake%';
SELECT error_code, error_description, logged_at FROM vehicle_errors WHERE logged_at BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY logged_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_codes ORDER BY error_code DESC;
SELECT error_description, vehicle_id FROM error_codes WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT error_description, timestamp FROM error_codes WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_codes WHERE error_code IN (404, 500, 503);
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_info WHERE vehicle_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_codes WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_info WHERE vehicle_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_codes WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT diagnostic_id, diagnostic_data FROM diagnostic_info WHERE timestamp > '2020-12-31' AND vehicle_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_info WHERE vehicle_id = 1010 ORDER BY diagnostic_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors ORDER BY err_code DESC;
SELECT description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE err_code = 101;
SELECT timestamp, description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, timestamp FROM vehicle_errors WHERE err_code IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_information WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY diag_id ASC;
SELECT err_code, description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE err_code = 1001;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, error_code, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM diagnostic_information GROUP BY vehicle_id, error_code;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id FROM diagnostic_information WHERE error_code IN (1001, 2003);
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE date_scheduled BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors;
SELECT error_description, error_code FROM vehicle_errors;
SELECT vehicle_id, diagnostic_code, diagnostic_message FROM diagnostic_information;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_code, maintenance_message FROM predictive_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_errors WHERE error_code = 500;
SELECT error_description FROM vehicle_errors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, diagnostic_message FROM diagnostic_information WHERE diagnostic_code > 100;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_code, maintenance_message FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_error_codes;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM vehicle_error_codes ORDER BY error_code DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, reading_value FROM vehicle_readings WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_message FROM diagnostic_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, reading_value FROM vehicle_readings WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_value ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' AND assigned_technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT error_id, error_code, error_description FROM vehicle_error_codes WHERE error_code LIKE 'ERR%';
SELECT vehicle_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM diagnostic_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 123456 AND log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
